New Records: Jayson Tatum and Payton Pritchard added 20 each
Key Match Events: The Celtics led by 10 after three and scored the first 11 points of the fourth quarter to push their advantage to 93-72
White, Kristaps Porzingis and Pritchard made 3s in that stretch to help the Celtics pull away
Post-Match Reflections: Porzingis added 11 points with five rebounds in his return after missing four games with a sprained left ankle
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Celtics won their third straight victory
The Rockets lost for the third time in four games
Others: Jalen Green had 27 points for the Rockets
